item.title: Mentioned by Windsor Star
item.description:
Racism attack not warranted
I read with utter disbelief the laughable accusation levelled by Quebec MP Tyrone Benskin (NDP-Jeanne-Le Ber) that MP Jeff Watson (C-Essex) is accused of engaging in a subtle form of racism for "segregating" as he puts it, Black Canadians. In no way is this allegation true. With all due respect, it is unfortunate that MP Benskin chose to ... As a Member of Parliament, Jeff reveres and upholds multiculturalism and its ideals. He can stand on his record. As a family man and a father, anyone watching Jeff interact with ...
